title: It Is Impossible To Love And Be Wise.
alternative_title: 何も知らないけど、キミが好き。 ; Nani mo Shiranai kedo, Kimi ga Suki ; Có Thể Tôi Ngây Ngô Nhưng Tôi Thích Em
status: 何も知らないけど、キミが好き。 ; Nani mo Shiranai kedo, Kimi ga Suki ; Có Thể Tôi Ngây Ngô Nhưng Tôi Thích Em
description:
Description :
        I have someone I like. Far away. It was a long way away. The reason why otaku don't fall madly in love with their favorite is because of that "distance". Airi is an otaku who rejects live-action films and is a two-dimensional supremacist. In the "2.5 dimension," the space between fiction and reality, she encounters a real-life protagonist.
